text.p: Hambrecht & Quist cut its recommendation on SystemSoft Corp to hold from buy based on disappointing sales of the company's SystemWizard product.
--cut earnings per share estimates for fiscal 1998 to $0.45 from $0.50 and its revenue projection to $70 million from $73 million.
--cut earnings per share estimates for fiscal 1999 to $0.75 from $0.80 and its revenue projection to $110 million from $115 million.

--said that while company enjoyed healthy growth in the first quarter in its PC card software business, a trend which will likely persist for the rest of the year, disapointing SystemWizard sales led to a slight revenue shortfall.
--said the second quarter will be critical for SystemWizard in determining now quickly sales will ramp up over the next several quarters.
